text: Mike Goldberg (born November 24, 1964) is a sportscaster for the UFC for Fuel TV, FSN, FX, Spike TV, and FOX. Goldberg is a studio host for College Football on FSN as well as calling preseason games for the Arizona Cardinals. He has called NHL games for ESPN, the Phoenix Coyotes, Detroit Red Wings, Vancouver Canucks, and Minnesota Timberwolves. Goldberg also calls play-by-play for the Red Bull Air Race World Series and is a host/play-by-play for Shaq vs. with Shaquille O'Neal. title: Mike Goldberg
